articles.title: Aurora breakthrough: ‘Never-before-recorded’ red arc activity seen above New Zealand - Express
articles.description: A NEVER-BEFORE-RECORDED red auroral-like arc transformation was recorded in the skies above New Zealand's South Island, a study has reported.
